965.question: Which hyperparameters were varied in the experiments on the four tasks?

5-Table5-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are: 'number of clusters', 'word embedding size', and 'number of clusters'.</s>
The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are the number of clusters (100, 250, 500, 1000, and 2000) and the word embedding size (100, 250, 500, and 1000).</s>
3-Table1-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are: 'No clusters', 'skipgram40, w5', 'skipgram00, w5', 'skipgram00, w10', 'cow', 'cow00, w5', 'cow00, w10', 'glove40, w5', 'glove100, w5', 'glove100, w10', and 'glove50, w5'.</s>

The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are the number of clusters (100, 250, 500, 1000), the skipgram window size (5.., 10.., 20..), and the cbow window size (5.., 10.., 20..).</s>
3-Table2-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are: 'No clusters', 'skipgram_40, w/5', 'skipgram_00, w/5', 'skipgram_00, w/10', 'chow_40, w/5', 'chow_00, w/5', 'chow_00, w/10', 'glove_40, w/5', 'glove_100, w/5', and 'glove_100, w/10'.</s>

The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are: 'No clusters', 'skipgram_40, w/5', 'skipgram_00, w/5', 'skipgram_00, w/10', 'chow_40, w/5', 'chow_00, w/5', 'chow_00, w/10', 'glove_40, w/5', 'glove_100, w/5', 'glove_100, w/10', and 'glove_100, w/100'.</s>
4-Table3-1.png: The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are: 'number of clusters', 'word embedding size', and 'number of clusters'.</s>
The hyperparameters varied in the experiments on the four tasks are the number of clusters (100, 250, 500, 1000, and 2000) and the word embedding size (100, w/5, w/10, and w/15).</s>

965.answer: number of clusters, seed value in clustering, selection of word vectors, window size and dimension of embedding
